TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditCommandColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 控件的一种特殊列类型，包含用于编辑每行中的数据项的 按钮。

span.span: A special column type for the control that contains the buttons for editing data items in each row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类为控件创建一个特殊列 ，该控件包含 `Edit` `Update` `Cancel` 网格中每个数据行的、和按钮。Use the class to create a special column for the control that contains the `Edit`, `Update`, and `Cancel` buttons for each data row in the grid. 使用这些按钮可以编辑控件中某一行的值 。These buttons allow you to edit the values of a row in the control. 如果未选择任何行，则会 `Edit` 在该控件中的 每个数据行的对象中显示一个按钮 。If no row is selected, an `Edit` button displays in the object for each data row in the control. 当 `Edit` 单击某一项的按钮时，将 引发该事件，并将 `Edit` 按钮替换为 `Update` 和 `Cancel` 按钮。When the `Edit` button for an item is clicked, the event is raised and the `Edit` button is replaced with the `Update` and `Cancel` buttons. 需要提供代码来处理 事件。You need to provide code to handle the event. 典型的事件处理程序将 属性设置为所选的行，然后将数据重新绑定到 控件。A typical event handler sets the property to the selected row, and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!NOTE] > 必须提供 、和属性的值 。You must provide values for the , , and properties. 否则，关联的按钮将不会显示在中 。Otherwise, the associated buttons will not appear in the . 通过设置属性，可以将中的按钮设置为显示为超链接或按钮 。The buttons in the can be set to display as hyperlinks or push buttons by setting the property. 单击 `Update` 或 `Cancel` 按钮将分别引发 或 事件。Clicking the `Update` or `Cancel` button raises the or event, respectively. 需要提供代码来处理这些事件。You need to provide code to handle these events. 事件的典型处理程序 将更新数据， 并将属性设置为 `-1` (以取消选择项) ，然后将数据重新绑定到 控件。A typical handler for the event updates the data, sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. 事件的典型处理程序 将属性设置 为 `-1` (，以便取消选择项) ，然后将数据重新绑定到 控件。A typical handler for the event sets the property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 对象可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。The object can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入 。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). 默认情况下，当 `Update` 单击控件中的按钮时，将执行页验证 。By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in the control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 若要防止页验证发生，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将对象添加 到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add an object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的按钮类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the button type for the column.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可指定列中的按钮是否显示为按钮或超链接。Use the property to specify whether the buttons in the column display as push buttons or hyperlinks. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性将 `Edit` 命令按钮显示为按钮。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the `Edit` command buttons as push buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的按钮类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified button type is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置为 中的 命令按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the command button in the .

value.span: 为 中的 命令按钮显示的标题。

span.span: The caption to display for the command button in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为中的命令按钮显示的文本 `Cancel` 。Use the property to specify the text to display for the `Cancel` command button in the . > [!NOTE] > 您必须为属性提供一个值 。You must provide a value for the property. 否则， `Cancel` 命令按钮将不出现在中 。Otherwise, the `Cancel` command button will not appear in the . 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为命令按钮提供自定义文本 `Cancel` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the `Cancel` command button. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 对象中的 按钮时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when an button in the object is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 中的 按钮时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when an button in the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当 `Update` 单击控件中的按钮时，将执行页验证 。By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in a control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. `Update` 通过使用属性单击控件中的按钮时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证 。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an `Update` button in an control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 如果将属性的值 设置为 `true` ，则还可以使用 属性来指定 `Update` 对象中的按钮导致验证的验证组的名称 。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which an `Update` button in the object causes validation. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为控件中的按钮显示的文本 `Edit` 。Use the property to specify the text to display for the `Edit` button in the control. > [!NOTE] > 您必须为属性提供一个值 。You must provide a value for the property. 否则，此 `Edit` 按钮将不会显示在中 。Otherwise, the `Edit` button will not appear in the . 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为按钮提供自定义文本 `Edit` 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the `Edit` button. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为中的命令按钮显示的文本 `Update` 。Use the property to specify the text to display for the `Update` command button in the . > [!NOTE] > 您必须为属性提供一个值 。You must provide a value for the property. 否则， `Update` 命令按钮将不出现在中 。Otherwise, the `Update` command button will not appear in the . 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为命令按钮提供自定义文本 `Update` 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the `Update` command button. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/CS/datagrideditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridEdit/VB/datagrideditvb.aspx#1)]

member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象在回发到服务器时导致验证的验证控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of validation controls for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 中的“Update”按钮在回发到服务器时导致验证的验证控件组。

span.span: The group of validation controls for which the Update button in an causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可以指定在对象的 "更新" 按钮 回发到服务器时导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the Update button in an object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当属性的值设置为时，属性才有效果 `true` 。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为属性指定值，则 当对象中的 "更新" 按钮 回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 如果没有为属性指定值， 并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则当对象中的 "更新" 按钮 回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the Update button in an object posts back to the server. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.
